en.title: Custom Table Builder
en.message:
Curious how many orders are still open for Russia?
Or how many stainless steel water heaters we produced in 2024?

Click **Create+** and customize your table:
pick the fields, group the data, and sum up what matters to you.

Filters are available in every column header. You can download your custom table after setup.

zh.title: 自定义表格
zh.message:
想知道还有多少俄罗斯市场的订单我们未完成吗？
或者你想了解在2024年我们生产了多少不锈钢热水器？

点击 **Create+** 自定义你的表格：
选择字段、分组数据，并汇总你关心的内容。

每个表头都可以进行筛选。自定义表格后可以下载。
